content.text:
# 2019 Empire Slovak Open – Singles

Bernarda Pera
| runner   =  Anna Blinkova
| score    = 7–5, 7–5
| type    = singles doubles
| before_name = Empire Slovak Open – Singles
| after_year=2023
}}
Viktória Kužmová was the defending champion, but chose to participate at the 2019 Italian Open.
Bernarda Pera won the title, defeating Anna Blinkova in the final, 7–5, 7–5.
Seeds
Evgeniya Rodina (first round)
#  Bernarda Pera (champion)
#  Johanna Larsson (first round)
#  Dalila Jakupović (second round)
#  Laura Siegemund (quarterfinals)
#  Misaki Doi (first round)
#  Natalia Vikhlyantseva (second round)
#  Nao Hibino (second round)
}}
